name: Perellove
description:
There is love in the air !

In Perellove, two partners share one controller to overcome the challenges of the road ahead. The road... to their wedding ! Try to cooperate the best you can, find the secret hearts and you'll get your kiss on the beach under the sunset <3

This project is a small jam-sized game made originally as a gift. It runs on Unreal Engine 4 - which seems a bit oversized for its own ambition - but was a wonderful opportuniy for me to learn about Blueprints visual scripting.

Enjoy !
